Text:
I am really happy to see these up here!

I am a big fan and missing a few, but I haven't seen a seed on here for a while. Could you please seed some more or have you blown your bandwidth??

Thanks
I seed but sometimes I shut down my computer !
take care :integrated subtitles in french or in french for a few
Anyone know how the quality of the movies are?  I have a few of these, but they're looking bad on an HD screen.

No offense aodren14, I was just asking about the seeding, these are really big files.

Thanks again.
I only downloaded Annie Hall.  Video excellent but sound is totally screwed up. Don't know about the other movies.

HEADS UP!

I downloaded only 3 of these torrents, so what I say only has bearing on those:

Company Man = dubbed in French, no alternative (original English) audio track that I could find.

Celebrity = dubbed in French, no alternative (original English) audio track that I could find.

Anything Else = original (English) audio track, French subs hard-encoded into the movie file, so impossible not to view them.

DOWNLOADER BEWARE!

merci pour l'intĂŠgrale. Pour info,
crimes et dĂŠlits (sweet & lowdown)=english audio  and french subs
I downloaded another of his woody allen files and the picture quality is excellent overall.  be aware though that some have french hard subs, but others are french dubs.
